thread.title: Caroline
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Caroline

author: Caroline
title: Caroline
text: I purchased two super anorak type jackets that are super quality and brilliant value for money. I really only needed one but because the sale was on, I bought the second one! I am so pleased and the speed of dispatch was fast and faultless! First time to shop with Country Attire, certainly won't be the last. I have already recommended you to a friend!
